text: Ani tyahuna motha atyacari kona ahe? Jo allahacya masjidimadhye allahace smarana karanyapasuna rokhila, ani tyanna ujadanyaca prayatna karila? Asa lokanni allahace bhaya rakhata, tyata dakhala jhale pahije. Tyancyakarita ya jagatahi apamana ahe ani akhirata (maranottara jivana) madhyehi mothamothya siksa-yatana aheta
